info.Calling_command: bcftools mpileup --min-BQ 20 --annotate 'FORMAT/AD,FORMAT/DP' --max-depth 50000  --regions 'chr1:4307263-4307263' --fasta-ref /nfs/srpipe_references/Homo_sapiens.GRCh38_full_analysis_set_plus_decoy_hla.fa --output-type u 27116_1#1.cram | bcftools call  --multiallelic-caller --keep-alts --skip-variants indels  --ploidy-file /nfs/srpipe_references/study3705.ploidy --output-type u  | bcftools filter  --mode +  --soft-filter LowQual --exclude '%QUAL<20 || MQ<20 || GT="RR" && FORMAT/AD[0:0]/FORMAT/DP < 0.8 || GT="AA" && FORMAT/AD[0:0]/FORMAT/DP > 0.2 || GT="RA" &&  FORMAT/AD[0:0]/FORMAT/DP < 0.2 || GT="RA" &&  FORMAT/AD[0:0]/FORMAT/DP >  0.8' --output-type v  | bcftools filter  --mode +  --soft-filter LowDepth --exclude 'FORMAT/DP<8' --output-type v
